org.transitime.applications

Class SchemaGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.applications.SchemaGenerator

  • public class SchemaGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    For generating SQL schema files based on classes to be stored in database that were annotated for Hibernate. This is much nicer than trying to figure out what the schema really should be by hand. This code was copied from http://jandrewthompson.blogspot.nl/2009/10/how-to-generate-ddl-scripts-from.html
    Author:
    john.thompson and Skibu Smith

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        args - args[0] is the package name for the Hibernate annotated classes whose schema is to be exported. args[1] is optional output directory where the resulting files are to go.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
